radiographic_examinations.findings: Liver appears within normal limits, no focal liver mass, patent main portal vein with hepatopetal flow, no ascites; no intrahepatic biliary dilation; non-mobile shadowing gallstone in gallbladder neck measuring up to 2.3 cm, associated gallbladder distention, minimal gallbladder wall edema, no associated pericholecystic fluid; pancreas not well visualized; no hydronephrosis in right kidney.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Minimal gallbladder wall edema, less pronounced than on the recent CT.
